vsParam:
The classroom cleaning is checked.
Next one is...

Hazel! The questionnaires concerning the
new menu of canteen are all given out!

Thank you. Let's wait for the statistics. Right, we have
to prepare the teaching supplies in classrooms.

Ah, this is the checklist for classroom cleaning. Can you
submit it to the Lecturer Office when you are done?

Hazel... She's always busy with the Student Union's
works whenever we see her.

But I heard that Hazel's academic results
are outstanding.

Uh, really? Look how busy she is,
does she really have time to study?

Perfect timing. I have an assignment which requires
a field investigation of monsters.

I need more hands.
Come on, go with me.

Uh, wait, Hazel!?
We haven't said yes...

You said anything?
Alright, let's go.

Ah, ah ha ha...
[px], be careful!
Sorel and you guys, come with me!?

Uh, you are pretty mellow today.
That's the right attitude, [px].

*Sob sob*, what will she make us do...
Anyway, good luck to us!

Right. That's the monster specified in the assignment!
We must investigate while fighting it, got it?

What!? Investigate while fighting!?
Uh, let's do this, [px]!

That's it for the report. Thank you for helping
me with the investigation, [px].

Ah, ah ha ha, you are welcome...
But I think we also helped with the report...

Alright, I am going to submit the assignment,
you guys come with me. Viewing assignments
of other disciplines is also a type of learning.

Sorry to disturb you, Ru Sensei.
I am here to submit my assignment.

Ah, Hazel. Seems you have brought
many people here, never mind.

Ru Sensei is very strict. I wonder what evaluation
will she give, I am very nervous...

... Mmm, good.
It's well-organized and easy to understand.

The point of view of pretty sharp,
you really are the chief candidate of this year.

Thank you, Ru Sensei.
I'll keep it up.

C, chief... So it means Hazel
is the one with the best results in the Academy!?

Ho ho. As the Student Union President, this is my
obligation. I must be everyone's example.
Uh. Student Union President needs to do that?

You are the Student Union President, and also the
chief candidate... So no one dares opposing you
in the Academy, right?

I don't know about that... So, [px],
can I count on you if I need help next time?

Ah, Hazel! I don't how to categorize and save
documents which have passed the publicity periods...

Which one should it be?
Let me see. I'll teach you how to categorize them.

Hazel really deserves the reputation she has...
We can't oppose her now, ah haha...
